description: Lists Amazon Web Services account users that are assigned to an application.

parameters.name: ApplicationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationAssignments
nested_items.description: The list of users assigned to an application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the application that has principals assigned.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the principal assigned to the application.

nested_items.name: PrincipalType
nested_items.description: The type of the principal assigned to the application.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
